creator: Urmobi
descriptionHtml:
Yo ho ho! Help pirate Bob go through all levels and find real pirate treasures in our Word Puzzle Game "Mind Pirates"!

To complete a level, correctly spell your finger to find words from the condition and hidden words. For collecting hidden words you will receive an additional reward! If you have any difficulties, Bob always has his talking parrot Harry, who knows all the words in the world. On the way to treasures you will find both simple levels, and levels where words belong to one topic. The number of words and their length increases with the passage of the game. Come and try our word puzzle yourself!


🏝 Fancy letters
Multi-colored letters, ice letters, blocked letters and letters with dynamite!

🏝 Thematic Levels
We have prepared for you special levels in which words relate to a specific topic. And in some of these levels you will find the personal belongings of Bob, who lost them by negligence.

🏝 Various tips
Bob's arsenal has bombs, guns and kerosene lamps to help you in the right moment. Oh yes, and don’t forget about the Harry Parrot! After all, he knows all the words in the world.

🏝 Lots of bonuses
Complete tasks to earn HUGE game money. Get rewards by finding more extra words! Play the wheel of fortune and win game money and boosters. Complete the daily level and get even more rewards!

🏝 Kill time with profit
Use your time to good use, check and replenish your vocabulary! In addition, you can play without the Internet.

🏝 Regular updates
We regularly add new levels so your word puzzle game never ends :)

Help is needed? Found bugs in our word game? Want to suggest how to improve the game?
Please contact us at info@urmobi.games. We really appreciate your feedback, all your comments will be carefully read.
descriptionShort: Find Words. Swipe Word Game.Free Crossword Puzzle Game Brain Teaser Word Collect

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improving stability and performance.

We sincerely wait and read your feedback. We will be grateful if you leave your feedback about our game and your thoughts on how we can improve it. Thanks!

title: Mind Pirates: Word Puzzle Game. Free Word Search.

creator: Urmobi
descriptionHtml:
If you are interested and addicted to the most fancy word search game, Word Search Puzzle is the game for you and your family!

Easy way to complete a level is to swipe your finger thru the letter tiles and to find the words from the level's topic. For collecting hidden words you will receive an additional reward! If you have any difficulties, our Pirate always has his talking parrot Harry, who knows all the words in the world. On the way to treasures you will find both simple levels, and levels where words belong to one topic. Come and try our word search puzzle yourself!


👍 Fancy letters
Multi-colored letters, ice letters, letters which is easy to unlock and letters with dynamite!

👍 Thematic Levels
We have prepared for you special levels in which words relate to a specific topic. In some of these fun and addictive levels you will find the Pirate's collectibles

👍 Various tips
Bob's arsenal has bombs, guns and kerosene lamps to help you in the right moment. Oh yes, and don’t forget about the Harry Parrot! After all, he knows all the words in the world.

👍 Lots of bonuses
Complete tasks to earn HUGE game money. Get rewards by finding more extra words! Play the wheel of fortune and win game money and boosters. Complete the daily level and get even more rewards!

👍 Kill time with profit
Use your time to good use, check and replenish your vocabulary with our Word Search Game! In addition, you can play without the Internet.

👍 Regular updates
We regularly add new levels so your word puzzle game never ends :)

Our new Word Search Puzzle is unlike any other. Play our word search game now - it's very addictive and fun! Take a look at our magic word board and try to find all the hidden words!
